content: lil` explorer`s hat and scarf-bib crochet pattern this is a crochet pattern you must know basic stitches chain half_double_crochet stitch slip stitch i used cotton yarn but you can use any kind of yarn you want make sure you use the same weight yarn or very close to one i used check mt and weight note in this pattern you work your half double crochet and slip stitches only in the back loops of your work scarf-bib worked side to side making decreases to shape triangle ch1 doesn t count as a stitch note in this pattern you work your half_double_crochet and slip stitches only in the back loops of your work scarf-bib worked side to side making decreases to shape triangle ch1 doesn t count as a stitch abbreviations half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet chain- chain slip_stitch- slip_stitch st- stitch mp- make pin prev - previous sizes sizes 1year 2year 3year 4year head 46-48 cm 48-49 cm 50-51 cm 52-53 cm circumstance finished size 41 5 cm 45 cm 48 5 cm 52 cm head height 19 cm 20 cm 21 cm 22 cm please allow ±1 cm differences in measurments check your head circumstance carefully to choose right size supplies alize bella 100% cotton 100g 360meters color 7649 2 5mm crochet hook button gauge 33hdc x 28rows / 10x10cm square scarf-bib one size chain 131 half_double_crochet to second chain from the hook half_double_crochet to the end ch1 and turn crochet 2 more row in half_double_crochet now you ll be making buttonhole- hdc3 ch3 skip next 3 half_double_crochet and half_double_crochet into 4th stitch and keep half_double_crochet to the end ch1 turn half_double_crochet 3 more row at the end of 3rd row you ll be making pin- after your last half_double_crochet ch3 slip_stitch to 3rd chain from the hook and that s your pin turn and half_double_crochet as usual you ll be making pins like this at the end of each row once you made 1 pin on each side you will start to decrease to shape triangle by not making 3 last half_double_crochet on each row keep decreasing until the last 4hdc mp and slip_stitch in half_double_crochet pull yarn through your last st and weave all ends in sew your button on the opposite side of your buttonhole scarf-bib done hat note the hat worked back and forth from the top of the head to the edge and the rib part of the hat worked separately remember- work your half_double_crochet and slip stitches only in the back loops of your work ch1 doesn t count as a stitch and * marks repetition of the pattern chain 60- 63- 67- 72 rs half_double_crochet to 2nd chain from the hook insert a marker in front of your work so you always know your right and wrong sides and continue half_double_crochet to every chain to the end ch1 turn you have 59- 62- 66- 71 half_double_crochet ws half_double_crochet to the end ch1 turn rs * half_double_crochet to last 5hdc on prev row ch1 turn ws
